name: maybe: Interactive Stories
description:
Ever wanted to read on the go? Then Maybe: Interactive Stories is the perfect app from originally-written novels and filled with episodes edited just for you. A must-have app to enhance your reading experience!

Key Features of Maybe:
▶ A collection of fantastic illustrations created by numerous illustrators in every chapter!
▶ The quality of interaction you get with the characters is unprecedented in all episodes!
▶ Customize your character and date with your favorite. Endings will vary based on your choices!

Current stories include:

◆ Royal Blood:
Your life changed upside down on the day of your mother's funeral.
The secret life of Vampires, and three men proposing to you.
Who will you choose at the end of this alluring tale?

◆ Triangle of Kisses:
After an office romance nightmare, you vow to start a new life. But then, not only does a young & rich boss and a sweet newbie appear before you, but there's also a gorgeous police officer next door as well!

◆ Princess Irene: (NAVER SERIES)
You are a tomboy princess who prefers pants over skirts, sword fights over dances. But in order to clear your country's debt, you must enter the Princess Consort Selection event, where only the best and beautiful are said to be chosen!

◆ Lord of Demons:
You are building an outstanding career to become the rightful Lord of Demons. But your journey leads you through hardship. Three men appear before at the moment of danger. At the end of this journey, will you be able to claim the throne?

◆ My Ex is So into Me: (NAVER SERIES)
Right before signing the contract of your lifetime, you meet two of your ex-boyfriends. One was the unforgettable 10 year-long first love and the other, whom you had an intense break-up. Will you be able to fall in love again?

◆ A Good Day To Be A Dog: (WEBTOON™)
You never had a proper kiss because of your big secret. But with one little mistake, your secret comes back as a curse! Out of the three men, who will be the one holding the key to undo your curse?

◆ Remarried Empress: (NAVER SERIES)
All your life you lived to become the perfect Empress. But the Emperor says he doesn't need a colleague-like Empress.
He instead chooses a slave to be by his side. And the mistress who has stolen your husband's heart has now set her eyes on your title, the Empress.

◆ Lady in Armor (NAVER SERIES)
To take revenge, you took the path of chivalry. Just when you thought you failed your revenge and died, you return to the days living as the Duke's daughter. Will you be able to protect your loved ones this time?

◆ A Bite of You: (NAVER SERIES)
You joined one of the top game companies in the world. Your happiness is short-lived after you become acquainted with a mysterious but handsome guy and strange things start to happen around you. Will you be able to keep this sweet but scary job?
